      • getStatus

        public TurnStatus getStatus()
        Gets the current status. The potential statuses are: ROLLING, ROBBING, PLAYING, DISCARDING, FIRSTROUND, SECONDROUND
        Returns:
        String status

      • setStatus

        Pre Conditions:;

        Post Conditions:
        the status has been set to the appropriate enum.

      • isPlayerTurn

        public boolean isPlayerTurn(int player)
        Deterimines if it is currently a certain player's turn.
        Parameters:
        player -
        Returns:
        boolean
        Pre Conditions:;
        player is a player index from 0-3
        Post Conditions:
        returns true if it is currently the player's turn, false otherwise.
